title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-4.2 - Exempt facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 361-4.2 - Exempt facilities

State Regulations

In addition to the exemptions provided in section
360.14
of this Title, the following
facilities are exempt from this Subpart: (a) A tree debris disposal facility as
specified in subdivision
363-2.1
(g) of this

Title. (b) A facility with a
maximum of 10,000 cubic yards total of material onsite, including storage of
incoming material and processed material, provided the piles adhere to the size
and spacing restrictions found in paragraphs 361-4.3(b)(4) and (6) of this

Subpart. (c) A facility used for
the storage and processing of yard trimmings or tree debris that is considered
storm debris from an area designated as a disaster area by the governor of New

York State, provided criteria specified by the department are
followed. (d) Repealed

Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
